title: Instant Bread Uttapam 😊|| Breakfast Recipe
content:
Easy & quick instant bread uttapam: South Indian recipe  Servings: 3 Duration : 15 mins  Bread is the main ingredient in this recipe. Either you can use whole wheat bread 🍞/ milk bread. For toppings I used onion, capsicum/bell pepper , ginger, green chillies and coriander. Bell pepper is optional You can use any other vegetable as u like instead of bell pepper. Today, I prepared an easy and tasty instant breakfast recipe bread uttapam with rice flour, maida, rava, onion, capsicum, ginger, green chillies and coriander Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: Whole wheat bread 🍞 - 4 slices Curd - 1/2 cup Rice flour- 1/4 cup Rava / semolina/ sooji - 1/6 cup Maida - 1/3 cup Salt - to taste Oil - 3 tb sp Toppings: Finely chopped: Onion - 1/2 cup Capsicum/ Green Bell pepper - 1/2 cup Ginger - 2 tb sp Green chillies - 1 tb sp Coriander - 1/2 cup Procedure:
  • Make bread into small pieces
  • In a mixer grinder add bread pieces, salt, curd, rava/semolina, rice flour and maida
  • Blend & make smooth paste
  • Batter must be medium thickness
  •  Heat tava on medium to high heat
  • Add 1 Ladle of batter at center of tava
  • Spread in circular motion
  • Add toppings
  • Onion, capsicum,ginger, green chillies and coriander
  • Cook for one minute by closing with lid
  • Remove lid & flip uttapam
  • Cook for one minute the other side too
  • Serve it hot in Breakfast with coconut chutney/ mango pickle
  • Coriander Coconut Chutney / Kothimeera Kobbari Chutney
  • Happy & Healthy cooking 😀
